maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.orig: How?!
maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.text: Comment ?!

maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.orig: Haha, did that quicksand just make you respawn from the top?\. That's neat!
maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.text: Haha, C'est ce sable mouvant qui t'as fait réapparaitre depuis là-haut ?\. C'est génial !

maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.orig: Back to \c[3]Official Playground\c[0]
maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.text: Retour au \c[3]Terrain de Jeu Officiel\c[0]

maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.orig: Here we are!\. This must be the testing area!
maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.text: Nous y voilà !\. Ça doit être la zone de test !

maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.orig: What the heck is this monstrosity?
maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.text: Mais qu'est-ce que c'est que cette monstruosité ?

maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.orig: I bet this was the hellspawn of a few over-ambitious interns.
maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.text: Je parie que c'est l'œuvre de quelques stagiaires très ambitieux.

maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.orig: Boy oh boy, doesn't this look exciting?
maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.text: Hé ben mec, c'est pas grisant tout ça ?

maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.orig: [nods]
maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.orig: Well then, let's go!
maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.text: Bon alors, c'est parti !

maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.orig: Ah... wait.
maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.text: Ah... attends.

maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.orig: I heard this area has been optimized for \c[3]single players\c[0].
maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.text: J'ai cru comprendre que cette zone était optimisée pour \c[3]un seul joueur\c[0].

maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.orig: Though it seems they didn't bother making it a proper instance.
maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.text: Mais bon, ils ne se sont pas embêtés à en faire une instance.

maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.orig: In any case...\. we better go through this level one after another.\. Just to be safe.
maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.text: En tout cas...\. On ferrait mieux de faire ce niveau un par un.\. Juste au cas où.

maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.orig: It's fine!\. You can go first!
maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.text: C'est bon !\. Je te laisse passer devant !

maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.orig: I'll just wait and watch until you're done!
maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.text: Je vais juste attendre et regarder jusqu'à que tu aies fini !

maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.orig: I assume I will not be able to stop you now, will I?
maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.text: J'imagine que je ne pourrais pas t'arrêter maintenant, hein ?

maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.orig: [shakes head]
maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.orig: Fine. At least this location seems isolated, so it is unlikely you will be spotted here.
maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.text: Bon. Au moins cet endroit à l'air isolé, donc il y a peu de chance que tu te fasses remarquer ici.

maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.orig: But please be careful.
maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.text: Mais sois prudente s'il te plaît.

maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.orig: Good luck! I heard they've been really creative with the usage of props in this level.
maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.text: Bonne chance ! J'ai entendu dire que ce niveau a été agencé...\. très curieusement.

maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.orig: You're still here?\. That last challenge is waiting for you!
maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.text: Tu es encore là ?\. Le dernier challenge t'attends !

maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.orig: Good luck!
maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.text: Bonne chance !

maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.orig: Nice going!\. ...\. Dang it, I should stop watching! I don't want to spoil the solution for myself.
maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.text: Joli !\. ...\. Ah mince, faut que j'arrête de regarder ! Sinon j'aurais déjà la solution.

maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.orig: Oh boy, this is quite the parkour, isn't it? But seems like you're almost through!
maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.text: Hé ben, ça c'est du parcours, hein ? Mais on dirait que t'y est presque !

maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.orig: Now look at that!
maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.text: Regardez-moi ça !

maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.orig: Ha!
maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.text: Ha !

maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.orig: So you know how to use \c[3]JADC\c[0]!\. Cool!
maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.text: Donc tu sais comment on fait un \c[3]JADC\c[0] !\. Cool !
maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.note: jadc = jump attack dash cancel, not translating it to Annulation Saut Attaque Sprint, ASAS

maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.orig: Don't you feel like doing this area the proper way?
maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.text: Tu n'as pas envie de venir ici proprement ?

maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.orig: Well...\. I actually might give it a try anyway.
maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.text: Bon...\. Moi je vais probablement essayer de toute façon.

maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.orig: How?
maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.text: Comment ?

maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.orig: Hm?\. It's called a \c[3]JADC\c[0]. Never seen it before?
maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.text: Hm ?\. C'est un \c[3]JADC\c[0]. T'as jamais vu ça avant ?

maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.orig: I'm kinda surprised they missed such an obvious shortcut.
maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.text: Je suis assez surpris qu'ils n'aient pas vu ce raccourci si évident.

maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.orig: Then again...\. it IS just a testing area...
maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.text: Mais bon...\. C'est aussi juste une zone de test...

maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.orig: Oh well, I might as well try to do this the proper way.
maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.text: Mais bon...\. Je peux aussi essayer de le faire correctement.

maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.orig: You can go ahead.
maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.text: Tu peux aller devant.

maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.orig: There's supposed to be a very nice challenge after this!
maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.text: Il y aurait soi-disant un vrai challenge après ça !

maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.orig: Good luck!
maps/heat/special/glitch-area.json/entit.text: Bonne chance !

maps/heat/special/glitch-boss.json/entit.orig: I remember the people who came up with this.
maps/heat/special/glitch-boss.json/entit.text: Je me souviens des gens qui l'ont imaginé.

maps/heat/special/glitch-boss.json/entit.orig: It started as a little joke that escalated.
maps/heat/special/glitch-boss.json/entit.text: Ça a commencé comme une petite blague, qui a fini par dégénérer.

maps/heat/special/glitch-boss.json/entit.orig: And it ended with this mess of a boss fight that breaks the majority of our design guidelines.
maps/heat/special/glitch-boss.json/entit.text: Et ça s'est terminé avec ce boss horrible qui enfreint la majorité de nos lignes directrices.

maps/heat/special/glitch-boss.json/entit.orig: But they were really proud of their creation, so of course they would just hide it somewhere!
maps/heat/special/glitch-boss.json/entit.text: Mais ils étaient si fiers de leur création, que, forcément, il fallait qu'ils la planquent quelque part !

maps/heat/special/glitch-boss.json/entit.orig: Oh, sorry. I will be quiet.
maps/heat/special/glitch-boss.json/entit.text: Oh, désolé. Je vais me taire maintenant.
